detail_desc: Straight-cut, sleeveless dress in woven fabric with a V-neck and pleat at the front, tie belt at the waist and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

All-in-one pyjamas in soft organic cotton jersey, one in pointelle and one with an all-over print. Picot trim around the neckline and a small, sewn-on bow at the top. Press-studs down the front and along one leg, and ribbing at the cuffs and hems.
Tights in a fine knit containing glittery threads. Elasticated waist and soft inside.
Baby Exclusive. Skirt in an organic cotton weave with smocking and elastication at the waist. Lined.
Trainers in imitation leather with a zip at the front. Mesh linings, cotton canvas insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a motif, a double-layered drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a chest pocket and embroidery at the top.
Long-sleeved tops in soft cotton jersey.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline and a motif.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Fitted jacket in a linen weave with notch lapels, a button at the front and jetted front pockets. Button at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.

Straight-style shirt in a soft cotton weave with a V-neck, concealed buttons down the front and a gathered yoke at the back. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a straight-cut hem with slits in the sides.
Heart-shaped earrings in metal and resin. Length 6 cm.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Regular fit.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in cotton piqué with a collar, button placket, straight-cut hem and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Leather belt with a metal buckle. Width 2.9 cm.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a chest pocket. Yoke with a pleat at the back and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Slightly longer at the back.
Sports hoodie in sturdy jersey with a print motif, high collar and mesh-lined, drawstring hood. Mesh-lined kangaroo pocket, long raglan sleeves with seams, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Trainers with lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and chunky thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Bracelet in pile with a soft toy in the form of a unicorn with embroidered details and glittery appliqués. Snap-on strap. Size of bracelet 3x20 cm. Length of soft toy from horn to hoof approx. 22 cm.

Padded parka in woven fabric with a soft, brushed finish and a detachable, faux shearling-lined hood with a faux fur trim. Zip down the front, a drawstring at the waist and flap side pockets with a press-stud. Inner ribbing at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined in faux shearling lining at the top and a diamond-quilted weave below.

Shirt in an airy linen and cotton blend with a turn-down collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Open chest pocket, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Chelsea boots in imitation leather with elastic gores in the sides and loops at the top. Fleece linings and insoles and chunky soles. Heel approx. 2 cm.
Short, pleated jersey dress with a deep V-neck, an opening with a covered button at the back of the neck and short, wide sleeves. Elasticated seam at the waist.
Headband in a soft rib knit with a decorative knot detail at the front. Width approx. 11 cm.

Knee-length dress in woven fabric with a sheen. Opening at the top and a stand-up collar with ties at the front. Long sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Lined.
Shaping briefs in microfibre and lace with a high waist, lined gusset and medium coverage at the back. Firm shaping effect on the waist and hips.
Running top in fast-drying functional fabric with a high polo neck, long raglan sleeves with thumbholes at the cuffs, and reflective details.
Leggings in soft, organic cotton jersey with wide, foldover ribbing at the waist.

Calf-length dress in a soft linen and viscose weave with a V-neck, concealed buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Detachable tie belt at the waist, dropped shoulders and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Unlined.

Gently flared, softly draping, knee-length satin dress with a V-neck, narrow adjustable shoulder straps and shaped cups. Seam under the bust with a wide, decorative frill and elastication at the back. Unlined.
T-shirt in soft slub cotton jersey with a button placket and chest pocket in woven fabric.
Knee-high boots in imitation leather with jersey linings, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel 8.5 cm.
Zip-through hoodie in lightweight, printed cotton sweatshirt fabric. Jersey-lined hood, a zip down the front with a chin guard, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Trainers with lacing at the front, fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Ankle-length suit trousers in woven fabric with a high waist, zip fly, concealed hook-and-eye fastening and tapered legs with creases.
Jumper in a soft cable knit with buttons on one shoulder and long raglan sleeves.
Blouse in an airy weave with a collar, buttons down the front, a yoke with decorative gathers at the back and long, wide sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Sleeveless top in a viscose weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Leggings in soft jersey with a motif and an elasticated waist.
Fancy dress costume in soft velour with long sleeves and long legs. Hood with embroidery and appliqués, a zip down the front with a chin guard and narrow ribbing at the cuffs and hems.
Sleeveless playsuit in a viscose weave with elastication and a flounce at the top, an elasticated seam at the waist and discreet pockets in the side seams.
Jersey top with a round neckline and 3/4-length sleeves. Decorative plastic stones around the neckline and cuffs.
Short, fitted dress in stretch denim with a collar, metal press-studs down the front, chest pockets and long sleeves with press-studs at the cuffs. Unlined.

Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined wrapover hood, high wrapover slits at the sides and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs. Can be used both during pregnancy and when nursing afterwards.
Baby Exclusive. Tube scarf knitted in a soft cotton and silk blend.
Sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with flatlock seams, long raglan sleeves, twisted side seams and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Short-sleeved top in a rib knit with a V-neck, button placket and wide, ribbed hem.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with dropped shoulders, long, embroidered sleeves, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Velvet shoulder bag with a narrow metal chain shoulder strap, quilted flap with a magnetic fastener and a zip at the top. Lined. Size 4.5x10x19 cm.
Narrow, satin-covered Alice band with appliqués on top in the shape of glittery, padded ears, and an elegant veil for the face.

Set with a knitted jacket and pair of trousers lined with soft, thermal fleece. Jacket with a stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, long raglan sleeves and front pockets. Trousers with an elasticated waist. The polyester content of the set is partly recycled.
Fine-knit bolero in a soft cotton blend containing glittery threads with a button at the neck and long sleeves.
Sun hat in cotton seersucker with ties under the chin. Width of brim approx. 4 cm. Lined.
Suit trousers in woven fabric with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side pockets, a fake welt back pocket and legs with creases.
Shorts in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated, drawstring waist and rounded hems.
Dressing gown in soft pile with a detachable tie belt at the waist.
Wide trousers in an airy, patterned weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.
Sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with a straight-cut front and long sleeves with a print motif at the cuffs. Rounded and longer at the back.
Romper suit in soft terry made from a cotton blend with short sleeves and short legs. Hood with sewn-on ears, and press-studs at the top and at the crotch.
Court shoes with pointed toes and covered heels. Imitation leather linings and insoles and thermoplastic polyurethane (TPU) soles. Heel 8 cm.
Baby Exclusive. Padded linen rattle in the shape of a porcini mushroom. Length approx. 11 cm.
Joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Metal rings in various designs.
Fancy dress costume in soft velour with a sheen. Hood with embroidered details and appliqués, a zip down the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hems.
5-pocket denim jeans with a high waist, button fly and straight legs.
Short satin dress in a narrow cut at the top with gathers, double shoulder straps that cross at the back, a wide, elasticated seam at the waist and gathered skirt. Lined.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in organic cotton jersey with a ribbed collar and button placket.
Hat in a soft, fine knit with faux fur pompoms at the top and embroidery on the turned-up hem.
Calf-length, sleeveless dress in a softly draping weave made from a Tencel™ lyocell blend. High cut at the front, narrow shoulder straps and covered elastication at the back. Cotton jersey lining.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs at the crotch.

Blouse in a crisp weave made from a cotton blend with a sweetheart neckline, elasticated seam under the bust and smocking at the back. Short puff sleeves with elastication over the shoulders and narrow, concealed elastication at the hems. Unlined.
Long-sleeved top in soft pile with a motif. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short shorts in a viscose crêpe weave with a small frill trim at the top and a high, elasticated waist with decorative ties.
Short dress in jersey crêpe with lace insets, a round neckline and short cap sleeves. Seam at the waist, a concealed zip at the back and a bell-shaped skirt.

Set with a top and pair of trousers in a soft cotton blend. Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with long raglan sleeves and a wrapover front with a concealed press-stud at one side and ties at the other. Trousers in ribbed jersey with an elasticated waist and full feet with elasticated heels. The cotton content of the set is organic.

Shirt in airy end-on-end cotton with a button-down collar, classic front and open chest pocket. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, a yoke with a pleat and hanger at the back, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

Padded all-in-one suit in wind- and water-repellent functional fabric with a detachable, fleece-lined hood with a faux fur trim. Zip down the front that continues part-way down one leg, a zipped chest pocket and elastication at the back, cuffs and hems. Reinforced at the knees and back, reinforced elastic straps at the hems and reflective details. Fleece lining. The all-in-one suit has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Straight-cut, striped blouse in a woven cotton blend with an opening and button at the back of the neck and short, gathered sleeves with a tie at the top.

Short dress in a stretch jersey crêpe with a V-neck, wrapover front and gathered yoke at the back. Gathers at the shoulders, short cap sleeves and a seam at the waist with a sewn-on tie belt. Unlined.
